title: Need 3's ranked.
body:
Gonna make this short and sweet and get directly to the point~

5v5 is bloody cancer, especially yolo-Q. Open up 3's ranked for a month and see how it goes. It's not like you have anything to lose.

Sincerely, a player that doesn't have 4 other consistent friends to play with.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Unfortunately OCE doesn't currently support 3v3 constantly, so I doubt we'll get 3v3 ranked anytime soon.

However new modes are constantly being re-evaluated and may be added at any time.

For the current queue schedule, check out [this thread by Riot Gehirn](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BX05N9lh-queue-schedule-updated).
